Aldehyde, tert. Amine bzw. Acetale aus Amidacetalen und

docTitle.titlePart: Aldehydes, tert. Amines or Acetales from Amidacetales and Grignard-Compounds

front.div:
A b s t r a c t . Amidacetales 1 or -memaptales 9 respectively react with Grignard-agents dependent
on molar ratio by exchange of methoxy-or methylthio group via not isolable 0 , N -or S,N-acetnles
to the corresponding aldehydes 4 or the tert. ;&mines 3. Starting from bicyclic amidacetales (i alde-
hydes or bis-P-hydroxyethylamines 8 are formed. By quaternisation of the amidaoctal-nitrogen
followvcd by reaction with Grignard-agents the corresponding 0,O-acetales me formed.
